dsOverview.title: Vecchia's Upper Midwest U.S. Monthly Station Summaries

summary.p: This dataset contains monthly summary information for stations in seven Upper Midwest states (Minnesota, Iowa, North Dakota, South Dakota, Montana, Wyoming, and Nebraska). Included in the summaries are temperature, precipitation, and snowfall statistics.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: COLOSTATE/STAT > Department of Statistics, Colorado State University

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Surface Air Temperature
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount
